column4: hello, i am pretty new to linux. I just installed 11.10 and some apps, like irssi. I know how to execute them but, I would like to know how can i create shortcuts for my desktop/left bar. I really couldnt find any explanation on something that simple, i guess everyone knows that but i dont :P
so you guys always start applications from a terminal?
irssi is very powerful as it can use python scripts
i installed gtalk but it doesnt seem to run, i used "gtalkd" to start it but it does nothing
